description: This Dart source file defines the CaptureScreen widget for a Flutter app, facilitating menu image capture via camera or gallery import, and handling navigation to a processing screen.

classes.name: CaptureScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides UI and logic to capture or import menu images, handling API key validation, user interactions, and navigation.

classes.name: ProcessingArgs
classes.description: A simple class to pass image data URL as an argument to the processing screen during navigation.

classes.name: ProcessingScreen
classes.description: A placeholder widget for the menu processing view, displaying the received image data and status.

methods.name: _handleCapture
methods.description: Handles capturing an image from the camera asynchronously, manages loading state, and initiates navigation upon success.

methods.name: _handleImport
methods.description: Handles selecting an image from the gallery asynchronously, manages loading state, and initiates navigation upon success.

methods.name: _showMissingKeySnack
methods.description: Displays a SnackBar informing the user about missing API key configuration.
